General.Name: Xiamen Sunrise Wheel Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Sunrise Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, fabrication, and distribution of steel wheels in the People's Republic of China. The company offers section steel wheels, lightweight tubeless steel wheels, and forged aluminum alloy wheels used in domestic and foreign passenger cars, trucks, tractors, micro trucks, special vehicles, and other commercial vehicles. It also exports its products to approximately 100 countries Europe, America, Central and South America, Southeast Asia and Australia, the Middle East, and Africa. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Sunrise Wheel Group Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Xiamen Sunrise Group Co., Ltd. in June 2015. Xiamen Sunrise Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.
